Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 137th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Earned first career win on 5/30/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,992,857 through salary arbitration...
8/24/2016: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $15,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/31/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Struck out 16 batters against San Francisco on 5/21/2018...
Struck out 16 batters against Montreal on 9/25/2018...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2020, going 3-1, 1.36...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/10/2021 to a 4-year deal worth $26,000,000 per year...
Injured on 8/1/2021 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 5/17/2023 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
